description:
Excave III : The Tower of Destiny is a
classic Japanese style dungeon
crawler with the heroine Scarlett
taking on huge hordes of enemies in a
climb up through the Fantasy Tower.

The Fantasy Tower is connected to
Internet Rankings so you can compete
with players from around the country.

Auto generated maps await so you
can enjoy a different experience each
time.

If EXCAVE II - Wizard of the
Underworld save data is found then
special unlocks will occur!
name: Excave III : Tower of Destiny
